animatedHero.title: A Fragrance Experience, Reimagined as
animatedHero.description: Elevate your venue with a touch of modern luxury. Our automated fragrance machine offers a unique, memorable experience for your guests, creating a new revenue stream with zero upfront investment.

engineeredForElegance.title: Engineered for Elegance
engineeredForElegance.description: Our vending machine is more than just a dispenser; it's a statement piece designed to blend seamlessly into any luxury environment. Every detail has been meticulously crafted to offer an unparalleled user experience.

design.title: Sleek & Compact Design
design.description: With a width of just 60cm, its minimalist aesthetic complements any interior, from hotel lobbies to exclusive clubs.

touchscreen.title: Interactive Touchscreen
touchscreen.description: A vibrant, high-definition display guides users through scent selection with beautiful visuals and intuitive navigation.

atomization.title: Advanced Atomization
atomization.description: Our patented technology ensures a perfect, fine mist application every time, maximizing the fragrance experience without waste.

payments.title: Secure Contactless Payments
payments.description: Equipped with the latest NFC technology for fast, secure, and convenient tap-to-pay transactions.

seamlessExperience.title: A Seamless Experience for Your Guests
seamlessExperience.description: Our machine offers a simple, intuitive journey for your customers, creating a memorable, premium amenity that generates effortless revenue for your business.

selection.title: 1. Intuitive Selection
selection.description: Guests browse a curated collection of premium perfumes on the vibrant touchscreen, finding the perfect scent to elevate their experience at your venue.

payment.title: 2. Effortless Payment
payment.description: With modern contactless payment technology, transactions are quick, secure, and seamless. A simple tap is all it takes.

luxury.title: 3. A Touch of Luxury
luxury.description: Our advanced atomization delivers a perfect mist, providing a sophisticated fragrance experience that leaves a lasting positive impression.

pricingPage.title: Partnerships & Pricing
pricingPage.description: Discover how our Perfume Vending Machine can add a luxury experience to your location while generating a new revenue stream.

earnWithEverySpray.title: Earn with every spray
earnWithEverySpray.description: With the Perfume Vending Machine – Pay per Spray – we offer your visitors a luxury perfume experience for just €3 per spray. Ideal for a quick refresh after sports, after work, or for a night out.
